content: James C. Gee | Faculty | About Us | Perelman School of Medicine | Perelman School of Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania About Us Our Faculty James C. Gee James C. Gee, Ph.D. Professor of Radiologic Science in Radiology Director, Penn Image Computing and Science Laboratory, Department of Radiology, Perelman School of Medicine, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Co-Director, Translational Bio-Imaging Center, Institute of Translational Medicine and Therapeutics, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Faculty Affiliate, General Robotics, Automation, Sensing and Perception (GRASP) Laboratory, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Director, MSE in Data Science Online Program, School of Engineering and Applied Science, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Co-Chair, Committee on Appointments and Promotions, Department of Radiology, Perelman School of Medicine, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Director, Interfaces Program in Biomedical Imaging and Informational Sciences, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA Faculty Search Advisor, Department of Radiology, Perelman School of Medicine, University of Pennsylvania, Philadephia, PA Department: Radiology Graduate Group Affiliations Computer and Information Science Bioengineering Contact information Department of Radiology Penn Image Computing and Science Laboratory Richards - 6th Floor 3700 Hamilton WalkPhiladelphia, PA 19104-6116 Office: 215-746-6295 Email: gee@upenn.edu Links Laboratory website Biography Page, Penn Image Computing and Science Laboratory Education: B.S.
